2385.description: Smash Dark Ronin in Forbidden Valley to collect 5 Cracked Ronin's Helms. Return them to Duke Exeter in Nexus Tower.

2386.description: Smash Maelstrom Horsemen in Forbidden Valley to collect 1 Splintered Horseman's Lance. Return it to Duke Exeter in Nexus Tower.

2447.description: Complete 20 more Missions or Achievements in Nexus Tower, for a total of 60.

2449.description: Complete 100 more Missions, for a total of 200.

2450.description: Complete 100 more Achievements, for a total of 300.

2451.description: Return to the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room.

2452.description: Quick Build the broken Imagimeter Base next to Hael Storm.

2455.description: Subscribe to Lego Universe during the Nexus Tower launch.

2472.description: Talk to Bob on the center platform of the spaceship.

2473.description: Interact with a mailbox to find Cole's mail.

2474.description: Get the Ninjago item out of Cole's mail and give it to Rocco Sirocco in the Sentinel Base Camp.

2479.description: Launch to Avant Gardens, then talk to Wisp Lee.

2488.description: Smash 5000 more enemies in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

2489.description: Visit 500 more Properties on any world.

2490.description: Score a cumulative total of 500,000,000 more points in Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

2491.description: Hit 2500 more Maelstrom-infected ships in Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

2492.description: Hit 100 more ducks in Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

2493.description: Hit 50 more sea monsters in Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

2494.description: Complete 100 more Missions, for a total of 300.

2495.description: Complete 100 more Missions, for a total of 400.

2496.description: Complete 100 more Achievements, for a total of 400.

2501.description: Collect all of the pink rocket parts on the Venture Explorer.

2513.description: Find a pink Engine rocket module on the Venture Explorer.

2514.description: Complete 10 more Missions or Achievements in Nimbus Station, for a total of 50.

2515.description: Complete 10 more Missions or Achievements in Gnarled Forest, for a total of 70.

2521.description: Smash 250 more pieces of Venture Koi debris on Crux Prime.

2522.description: Smash 500 more pieces of Skeleton equipment on Crux Prime.

2523.description: Quick Build 150 more Shield Zones on Crux Prime.

2524.description: Smash 500 more Stromling Mech Invaders on Crux Prime.

2525.description: Smash 250 more Dark Spiderling Invaders on Crux Prime.

2526.description: Smash 250 more Stromling Admiral Invaders on Crux Prime.

2527.description: Smash 250 more Stromling Ape Invaders  on Crux Prime.

2528.description: Smash 250 more Dark Ronin Invaders on Crux Prime.

2529.description: Smash 250 more Maelstrom Horseman Invaders on Crux Prime.

2530.description: Smash 100 more Maelstrom Dragon Invaders on Crux Prime.

2531.description: Smash 1000 more Skeletons on Crux Prime.

2532.description: Smash 25 more named Maelstrom enemies on Crux Prime.

2534.description: Compete in 100 more races, for a total of 200.

2535.description: Win any 50 races (at least 3 players per race).

2536.description: Smash 1000 more Smashables in any number of races.

2537.description: Collect 1500 more Imagination power-ups in any number of races.

2538.description: Smash 500 more Hammer Stromlings in the Venture Explorer.

2539.description: Smash 250 more Corrupted Sentries in the Venture Explorer.

2540.description: Smash 100 more Elite Dark Spiderlings in the Venture Explorer.

2541.description: Fly to Ninjago from Nexus Tower, then speak to Toshiro Gojira, the Battlefield Guard.

2542.description: Use one of the side gates to get inside the Monastery. Then speak to Sensei Wu.

2543.description: Hold the attack button to charge your Spinjitzu - then release the button to unleash a Spinjitzu attack in front of Sensei Wu!

2544.description: Smash Skeleton Troopers and Blacksmiths on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve 5 Maelstrom Daggers.

2546.description: Smash 5 Maelstrom Weapon Crates on the Ninjago Battlefield, then Quick Build them into a surprise for the Skeletons.

2548.description: Smash Skeleton Marksmen on the Ninjago Battlefield until you find all 3 pages of the Bone Bucket Instructions.

2549.description: Buy a Monastery Flag Banner Model from Bubu Mumu in the Monastery, then take it back to Jay.

2550.description: Smash and rebuild the Bone Buckets on 3 Skeleton Catapults on the Ninjago Battlefield.

2552.description: Smash 5 Skeleton Ladders on the Ninjago Battlefield and rebuild them into Bouncers.

2554.description: Buy a Sharp Kunai from Nya, the Monastery's Gear Vendor. Then take it back to Kai in the Dojo of Fire.

2555.description: Smash 5 Skeleton Siege Shields on the Ninjago Battlefield and rebuild them into Targets.

2556.description: Speak to Cole in the Monastery Dojo of Earth. Follow the orange banners to find him.

2557.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Earth Ninja kit and show Cole.

2558.description: Return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

2559.description: Speak to Jay in the Monastery Dojo of Lightning. Follow the blue banners to find him.
